title: Top of Burj Khalifa
description: Standing 828 meters above the world, the city below looked like a circuit board. A reminder that human ambition knows no bounds.

title: Swimming with Sharks
description: Slipping into the silence of the ocean with nurse sharks gliding past. It wasn't fear I felt, but a profound sense of connection to the wild.
takeaway: Calmness in the face of the unknown.

title: Everest Base Camp
description: 12 days of grit, thin air, and awe. Reaching 5,364m wasn't just about the altitude; it was about discovering the reserves of strength I didn't know I had.

title: Summit of Mount Fuji
description: A midnight ascent to catch the 'Goraiko' (arrival of light). Watching the sun break over the cloud sea made every step of the grueling climb fade away.
takeaway: The climb is worth the view.

title: Kedarkantha Trek
description: A winter summit at 12,500ft through knee-deep snow. The silence of the pine forests and the 360-degree view of the Himalayas redefined my understanding of peace.
